condition.name: App list empty?
Confirm Dialog: Do you want to restart now?
condition.title: App Caches successfully cleaned
condition.question: Do you want to restart now?

condition.name: DirectVPN Expression: connected
DirectVPN Expression: syslang/translations
Expression: containsElement(newList('Automagic Startup', 'Manual'), trigger) or global_octodroid_name == null
condition.expression: containsElement(newList('Automagic Startup', 'Manual'), trigger) or global_octodroid_name == null

condition.name: Expression: eval
Expression: global_package_info != null AND global_force_refresh_apps == false

Expression: if (!isList(global_accessibility_whitelist)) { global_accessibility_whitelist = newList( ); } trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure enabled_accessibility_services" and enabled_accessibility_services != global_accessibility_whitelist
Expression: if (global_dismiss_anr == null) { global_dismiss_anr = false; } global_dismiss_anr

Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Classic *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, package_name)) { return false; } text = "App task started (Classic)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;
Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Usage stats *") { text = "App task started (Usage stats)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "Plugin Event: AppContext START App(s): *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, acpackage)) { return false; } text = "App Context (app started):\n{acapp}\n{acpackage}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "Plugin: AppContext RUNNING App(s): *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, acpackage)) { return false; } text = "App Context (app running):\n{acapp}\n{acpackage}"; return true; } return false;
Expression: others = newList( "System Setting Changed: Secure enabled_accessibility_services", "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" ); !containsElement(others, trigger)

Expression: package_whitelist = newList( "ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic", "com.teslacoilsw.launcher", "com.android.launcher3.Launcher" ); activity_whitelist = newList( "com.android.systemui.recents.RecentsActivity", "android.widget.framelayout" ); source_class_name != "" and source_class_name != null and not containsElement(activity_whitelist, source_class_name) and not containsElement(package_whitelist, package_name)
Expression: trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" and accessibility_enabled == 0
condition.expression: trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" and accessibility_enabled == 0

condition.name: Expression: trigger == 'Octodroid input detected' and source_class_name == "android.widget.MultiAutoCompleteTextView" and before_text == "" and global_octodroid_version != null
condition.expression: trigger == 'Octodroid input detected' and source_class_name == "android.widget.MultiAutoCompleteTextView" and before_text == "" and global_octodroid_version != null

condition.name: Expression: value == "Copy the input to clipboard"
Expression: value == "Copy the result to clipboard"
Expression: value == "Review the result in a Debug window"
condition.expression: value == "Review the result in a Debug window"

action.name: Control UI: btn_send = "com.discord:id/text_input"; while (!existsElementById(btn_send)){ sleep(100); } setText2ById(btn_send, dbot_msg_prefix+msg+dbot_suffix); clickById("com.discord:id/send_btn"); back();

Control UI: signature = '\n---\nSent from my '+ global_device_model +' running Android '+ global_android_version +' via '+ global_octodroid_name +' v'+ global_octodroid_version; /*if (text == null){ text = getTextById("com.gh4a:id/basic_editor_scroll"); }*/ sendText(signature); //setText2ById("com.gh4a:id/basic

action.title: Sorry
action.message: Your language ({syslang}) is not supported. Pleasy modify [DirectVPN Expression: syslang/translations] in order to use the flow with your language.

action.name: Dis/Like if not already dis/liked
Execute Command: ping -c 1 discordapp.com | awk -F '/' 'END {print $5}' in

action.name: Remove Notification on Statusbar: All from app ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic (Text matches glob *Automagic input method is not started*)
Remove Notification on Statusbar: All from app ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic (Text matches glob *Error: Can not execute disabled flow *)
Script: //*Error: Can not execute disabled flow * exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];
Script: //Turn on 'return variable...' //returns variable 'app' with the selected application
action.script: //Turn on 'return variable...' //returns variable 'app' with the selected application

action.name: Script: _input = value; global_lasteval = value; choices = newList( //"Show the result again", "Review the result in a Debug window", "Copy the result to clipboard", "Copy the input to clipboard", "Start over", "Nothing" );
Script: addElement(choices, "Show stacktrace");
action.script: addElement(choices, "Show stacktrace");

action.name: Script: addElement(global_infobar, "{app_name} = {package_name}\n{source_class_name}"); if(length(global_infobar) > 3) removeElement(global_infobar, 0);
Script: app = getMapValue(apps, value); global_last_selected_app = app
action.script: app = getMapValue(apps, value); global_last_selected_app = app

action.name: Script: changed_components = join(changed_component_name_list, "\n");
action.script: changed_components = join(changed_component_name_list, "\n");

action.name: Script: dbot_cmd_prefix = "@bluscream "; author = split(notification_text, "\n")[2]; author = split(author, " ")[0]; notification_text_lower= toLowerCase(notification_text);
Script: dbot_msg_prefix = ":robot: "; device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); dbot_suffix = "\n\nSent from my {device_model} running Android {device_version}.";
Script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];
action.script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];

action.name: Script: frequencies = trim(frequencies); frequencies = split(frequencies, " "); freq = newList(); for (x in frequencies) { x = x / 1000; addElement(freq, x) } freq = replace(freq, "[", ""); freq = replace(freq, "]", ""); freq = replace(freq, " ", ""); //mfreq = "{mfreq, numberformat, #}" / 1000

Script: global_device_model = trim(device_model); global_android_version = trim(android_version); global_octodroid_name = package_info["com.gh4a"]["application_info"]["label"]; global_octodroid_version = package_info["com.gh4a"]["version_name"];

Script: global_force_refresh_apps = false; keys = getMapKeys(global_package_info); apps = newMap(); names = newList(); for (k in keys) { name = getAppName(k); addElement(names, name); addMapEntry(apps, name, k); } sort(names);
Script: global_infobar = newList("","","")
action.script: global_infobar = newList("","","")

action.name: Script: global_stop = true
action.script: global_stop = true

action.name: Script: governors = trim(governors); governors = split(governors, " "); governors = replace(governors, "[", ""); governors = replace(governors, "]", ""); governors = replace(governors, " ", "");
Script: if (global_stop == null) global_stop = false;
action.script: if (global_stop == null) global_stop = false;

action.name: Script: if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; }

Script: if (value == "Youtube") { app = "com.google.android.youtube"; activity = "com.google.android.apps.youtube.app.WatchWhileActivity"; } else if (value == "OGYoutube") { app = "com.google.android.ogyoutube"; activity = "com.google.android.apps.ogyoutube.app.WatchWhileActivity"; } else if (value == "Youtube Gaming") { app = "com.google.android.apps.youtube.gaming"; activity = "{app}.watchwhile.activity.WatchWhileActivity"; } else if (value == "Default") { _default = true; }
Script: msg = "**"+author+"** says: "+split(notification_text, "@Bluscream say ")[1];
action.script: msg = "**"+author+"** says: "+split(notification_text, "@Bluscream say ")[1];

action.name: Script: msg = "Mobile Discord Selfbot by Bluscream :joy:"
action.script: msg = "Mobile Discord Selfbot by Bluscream :joy:"

action.name: Script: msg = "Pong! ("+dbot_ping+"ms)"
action.script: msg = "Pong! ("+dbot_ping+"ms)"

action.name: Script: Package = value;
action.script: Package = value;

action.name: Script: setValue("isblocked", false);
action.script: setValue("isblocked", false);

action.name: Script: v = indexOfElement(names, global_last_selected_app)
action.script: v = indexOfElement(names, global_last_selected_app)

action.name: Set Default Input Method: Automagic Premium
Set Default Input Method: Automagic Premium in octo
Set Default Input Method: Hacker's Keyboard
Set Flow State: Disable Auto Dismiss ANR's
Set Flow State: Disable New activity
Set Flow State: Disable WiFi Connect Manually
Set Flow State: Disable Windows Recognizer
Set Flow State: Enable WiFi Connect Manually
Set Flow State: Enable Windows Recognizer
Set System Setting: Secure accessibility_enabled to 1
Set System Setting: Secure enabled_accessibility_services to
Show Custom Widget Overlay: Info Bar, Info Bar (1080*384) Bottom Center
Show Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message, Octodroid send message (60*120) Center Right
Show Custom Widget Overlay: Overlay_start_flow, Widget_start_flow (80*80) Top Right

flow.name: Accessibility Guard
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Attempt to disable accessibility! Settings
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" and accessibility_enabled == 0
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Accessibility settings modified! Settings2
Set System Setting: Secure accessibility_enabled to 1
Set System Setting: Secure enabled_accessibility_services to
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: if (!isList(global_accessibility_whitelist)) { global_accessibility_whitelist = newList( ); } trigger == "System Setting Changed: Secure enabled_accessibility_services" and enabled_accessibility_services != global_accessibility_whitelist

flow.name: AppSelector
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: global_package_info != null AND global_force_refresh_apps == false
flow.actioncontainer: Script: //Turn on 'return variable...' //returns variable 'app' with the selected application
Input Dialog: Select a app Single Choice {names,listformat,comma}
Script: app = getMapValue(apps, value); global_last_selected_app = app
Init Variable Package Info: All Packages into global_package_info

Script: global_force_refresh_apps = false; keys = getMapKeys(global_package_info); apps = newMap(); names = newList(); for (k in keys) { name = getAppName(k); addElement(names, name); addMapEntry(apps, name, k); } sort(names);

triggercontainer.trigger: UI Event: Window opened package com.android.systemui contains text Volume
UI Event: Window opened package com.android.vpndialogs matches glob %s attempts to create a VPN connection.

flow.name: Auto Dismiss ANR's
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: if (global_dismiss_anr == null) { global_dismiss_anr = false; } global_dismiss_anr
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Auto Dismiss? Notification ID 666

triggercontainer.trigger:
Plugin Event: AppContext START
App(s): Lucky Patcher.
The Event will trigger when any of the above items start.

flow.name: Automagic flow single runs

triggercontainer.trigger: Notification on Statusbar Displayed: ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic Text matches glob *Error: Can not execute disabled flow *

flow.actioncontainer: Remove Notification on Statusbar: All from app ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic (Text matches glob *Error: Can not execute disabled flow *)
Script: //*Error: Can not execute disabled flow * exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];

flow.name: Automagic keyboard on error

triggercontainer.trigger:
Notification on Statusbar Displayed: ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic Text matches glob Flow * ended with an error
Error: Automagic input method is not started*

flow.actioncontainer: Remove Notification on Statusbar: All from app ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic (Text matches glob *Automagic input method is not started*)
Control UI: //global_am_keyboard = false; sleep(100); click("Automagic Premium");
Script: exec_flow = split(title, "Flow ")[1]; exec_flow = split(exec_flow, " ended with an error")[0];
Set Default Input Method: Automagic Premium
Set Default Input Method: Hacker's Keyboard

flow.name: Billo Discord Selfbot
flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Screen: Discordapp.com is down! (long)
Notification on Screen: Discordapp.com is up! (long)
Script: msg = "Mobile Discord Selfbot by Bluscream :joy:"
Execute Command: ping -c 1 discordapp.com | awk -F '/' 'END {print $5}' in
Perform Action on Notification on Statusbar: Click notification

Control UI: btn_send = "com.discord:id/text_input"; while (!existsElementById(btn_send)){ sleep(100); } setText2ById(btn_send, dbot_msg_prefix+msg+dbot_suffix); clickById("com.discord:id/send_btn"); back();
Script: dbot_cmd_prefix = "@bluscream "; author = split(notification_text, "\n")[2]; author = split(author, " ")[0]; notification_text_lower= toLowerCase(notification_text);
Script: dbot_msg_prefix = ":robot: "; device_model = trim(device_model); device_version = trim(device_version); dbot_suffix = "\n\nSent from my {device_model} running Android {device_version}.";

flow.name: Clean Cache 2.0
flow.conditioncontainer: Confirm Dialog: Do you want to restart now?

flow.name: CPU Performance
flow.actioncontainer: Input Dialog: Set min CPU frequency Single Choice {freq}

Script: frequencies = trim(frequencies); frequencies = split(frequencies, " "); freq = newList(); for (x in frequencies) { x = x / 1000; addElement(freq, x) } freq = replace(freq, "[", ""); freq = replace(freq, "]", ""); freq = replace(freq, " ", ""); //mfreq = "{mfreq, numberformat, #}" / 1000
Init Variable Text File: /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/scaling_available_governors to governors
Init Variable Text File: /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/scaling_min_freq to mfreq
Init Variable Text File: /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/scaling_governor to gov
Script: governors = trim(governors); governors = split(governors, " "); governors = replace(governors, "[", ""); governors = replace(governors, "]", ""); governors = replace(governors, " ", "");
Input Dialog: Set CPU governor Single Choice {governors}
Init Variable Text File: /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/scaling_max_freq to mfreq
Input Dialog: Set max CPU frequency Single Choice {freq}
Input Dialog: CPU Performance Single Choice Menu Set CPU frequency,Set CPU governor
Init Variable Text File: /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpu0/cpufreq/scaling_available_frequencies to frequencies

flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: value == "Review the result in a Debug window"
Expression: value == "Copy the input to clipboard"
flow.actioncontainer: Input Dialog: Eval Multi-line text Enter AutoMagic code:

flow.actioncontainer: Input Dialog: What do you want to do now? Single Choice Menu {choices,listformat,comma}

triggercontainer.trigger: UI Event: Window opened package * matches glob *

flow.actioncontainer: Notification on Statusbar: Current Activity Information
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: package_whitelist = newList( "ch.gridvision.ppam.androidautomagic", "com.teslacoilsw.launcher", "com.android.launcher3.Launcher" ); activity_whitelist = newList( "com.android.systemui.recents.RecentsActivity", "android.widget.framelayout" ); source_class_name != "" and source_class_name != null and not containsElement(activity_whitelist, source_class_name) and not containsElement(package_whitelist, package_name)

flow.name: Octodroid Signature
flow.actioncontainer: Hide Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message
Show Custom Widget Overlay: Intercept Octodroid message, Octodroid send message (60*120) Center Right
Init Variable Package Info: com.gh4a into package_info
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: trigger == 'Octodroid input detected' and source_class_name == "android.widget.MultiAutoCompleteTextView" and before_text == "" and global_octodroid_version != null
Expression: containsElement(newList('Automagic Startup', 'Manual'), trigger) or global_octodroid_name == null
flow.actioncontainer: Script: global_device_model = trim(device_model); global_android_version = trim(android_version); global_octodroid_name = package_info["com.gh4a"]["application_info"]["label"]; global_octodroid_version = package_info["com.gh4a"]["version_name"];
Set Default Input Method: Automagic Premium in octo
Set Default Input Method: Hacker's Keyboard

Control UI: signature = '\n---\nSent from my '+ global_device_model +' running Android '+ global_android_version +' via '+ global_octodroid_name +' v'+ global_octodroid_version; /*if (text == null){ text = getTextById("com.gh4a:id/basic_editor_scroll"); }*/ sendText(signature); //setText2ById("com.gh4a:id/basic

flow.name: Settings guard
flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: others = newList( "System Setting Changed: Secure enabled_accessibility_services", "System Setting Changed: Secure accessibility_enabled" ); !containsElement(others, trigger)
flow.actioncontainer: Script: if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; } else if (trigger == "null") { "do something"; }

Input Dialog: Class name Single-line text

flow.name: The compensator

triggercontainer.trigger: UI Event: Window opened package * matches glob *

flow.conditioncontainer: Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Usage stats *") { text = "App task started (Usage stats)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "App Task Started: Classic *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, package_name)) { return false; } text = "App task started (Classic)\n{app_name}\n{package_name}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "Plugin Event: AppContext START App(s): *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, acpackage)) { return false; } text = "App Context (app started):\n{acapp}\n{acpackage}"; return true; } return false;

Expression: if (trigger == "Plugin: AppContext RUNNING App(s): *") { if (contains(package_whitelist, acpackage)) { return false; } text = "App Context (app running):\n{acapp}\n{acpackage}"; return true; } return false;

flow.name: Youtube Open with
flow.actioncontainer: Script: if (value == "Youtube") { app = "com.google.android.youtube"; activity = "com.google.android.apps.youtube.app.WatchWhileActivity"; } else if (value == "OGYoutube") { app = "com.google.android.ogyoutube"; activity = "com.google.android.apps.ogyoutube.app.WatchWhileActivity"; } else if (value == "Youtube Gaming") { app = "com.google.android.apps.youtube.gaming"; activity = "{app}.watchwhile.activity.WatchWhileActivity"; } else if (value == "Default") { _default = true; }
Input Dialog: Select app to play Youtube video with Single Choice Menu Default,Youtube,OGYoutube,Youtube Gaming (15s)
